main event: Civilian and military observers in Petropavlovsk, USSR, watched an unidentified elliptical-shaped object emitting pulsating lights.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 300-400 yards in diameter,The object moved at a high speed of approximately 3500 mph,Observers noted that the object had no visible appendages or protruding parts,The sighting lasted for about 10-15 minutes,This report is part of the archived Project Blue Book documents.
sighted object: an elliptical-shaped object with a dark center and bright lights around it
